properties.Name: CardFraudulentActivity
properties.Description: Fraudulent transactions on your card account not made by you or someone you permit to use your card.

Columns.Name: PaymentCardId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment Card.

Columns.Name: FraudCommittedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the fraud was committed.

Columns.Name: FraudDetectedTimestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the fraud was detected.

Columns.Name: WarningNoticeSentTimestamp
Columns.Description:
The timestamp that a warning notice was sent.

Ex: 
Hot cards are cards which, due to fraudulent use or cardholder overspending, the card issuer has decided to prohibit from further transactions. When records show a hot card has been used in a certain outlet, a warning notice is issued to the customer in question.

Columns.Name: WarningNoticeText
Columns.Description: The text of the warning notice.

Columns.Name: FraudLossAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of loss due to fraud.

Columns.Name: Note
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the fraud activity or transaction.

Columns.Name: PaymentCardFraudulentActivityTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Fraudulent Activity Type.

Properties.Description: Fraudulent transactions on your card account not made by you or someone you permit to use your card.
